Text:
It's been some time since we went out like this,
just the two of us.
Yeah.

We used to train together so often when we were
smaller... Hehe. Well, you've got me all to yourself
today.
Haha, lucky me...
My, look at you being all bashful.

So what would you like to do first? Shall I pick
out some clothes for you?
Actually, I'm more hungry than anything...

Hm? But didn't you just say you've been so upset
about breaking up with Alexia that you couldn't
eat a bite?
...O-Oh, yeah...

But...perhaps your appetite has returned since you're
on an outing with me? That I could understand.

...Yeah, I think that's it. I guess being with you
really relaxes me. Or something like that.
Listen to you!!!
Urgh?!
Oh, Cid, you really do love your sister, don't you?
I-I guess so, huh... Hahaha...

What would you like to eat? I'll treat you to
whatever you want.
Okay... Then maybe...that.

By "that," do you mean...Tuna King? Something so
inexpensive? As long as the restaurant is in the
three-star range or so, I can afford it.

No, cheap is good. I don't wanna spend all your
hard-earned money on fancy stuff.

Besides, I'm afraid of what I'd be in for later if
you got me something pricey...
Oh, and why is that?

N-Never mind! To tell the truth, I've always wanted
to get street food with you.

Oh...? Well, if it would please you that much,
I don't see why we can't.

And if we're going to do so, why don't we each get
different things and share them?
Um, I think I'll pass onâ€”
Come on, let's get going.

Cid finds himself caught by the collar and
dragged along.
It doesn't end there...

Oh, look, Cid. I think that's a new boutique. Let's
go see what they have.
Really? Doesn't this place seem kinda gaudy?

Oh, what's the harm in it? We'll just be trying a
few things on.
Over here...! Well? Does this hat suit me?
Mm...yeah, I guess so?
Such a tepid response. Take a closer look!

Hmm... They say they can do custom engravings on
pocket watches. How about we get a matching pair?
I'll buy yours, and you can buy mine.

Uh, but if you have one it'll probably get smashed
right awâ€”

Could you be any more rude! If it was a present from
you, I would treasure it with my life.
Ahh, that was fun.
Yeah. And the best part is you had a great time.

Seriously, what are you saying? This whole outing was
for you. You do understand that, yes?
Of course I do. Thanks, Claire.
Hehe... Now then, I suppose itâ€™s about that time...
Cid Kagenou, I presume?
Huh?

Suddenly, several men wearing the uniform of the
Knight Order appear.
...Uh, um, yes?

...Judging by your uniforms, you must be part of
Zenon's faction. What business do you have with
my brother?

Oh, we have lots of business with him! Thanks to this
little rat, we're total outcasts now!

Cid Kagenou! If you'd just broken under torture like
a good boy and confessed everything, none of this
would've happened!
B-But...!

As if knowingly applying unjust charges wasn't bad
enough, now it's misplaced resentment toward him?
Have you no shame as knights, let alone as human
beings?!

Shut it! You don't know how much we've had to suffer! 
We're here to get some payback outta his hide!

And now you have the gall to suggest you're entitled
to revenge? You are utterly irredeemable!

The men's selfish claims rouse Claire's wrath. The
atmosphere instantly grew so frigid one could swear
it is below freezing.
Your suffering is not Cid's fault or anyone else's.

Princess Alexia revealed that Zenon was her abductor
and that he was colluding with hereticsâ€”and this is the
natural outcome.

You pack of miscreants chose the wrong person to
deceive! Like any of you lot could ever beat Cid!!!

Big talk for a member of a sham order created for
show by the princess! And you're just a cadet too,
brat!
Claire, look out!
Cid?! Stay out of this. It's too dangerous!
N-No... I-I'm gonna fight too!
Don't be ridiculous! You're unarmed!
If I don't have a weapon...th-then I'll take one!
I-I did it! I-I got one!
Dammit... My sword!

(I can't believe it... When did he learn such a
dexterous maneuver...?)
Now I can fight too!
Y-You cocky little...!
Ack?! Whoa...!
Cid!
I-I can handle this much...!

(Cid... As weak as ever yet trying to be the hero
all the same...)

(But...I appreciate what you're doing. You've grown
far stronger than I ever expected. And that's all the
more reason why...)

I can't allow myself to be put to shame in front of
my brother.

...Wh-What the hell? She seems different all of
the sudden...
As you say, I may as of yet be a little knight cadet.

However, if I'm not so weak as to fall before the
likes of you...I'm also not so kind as to show you
one shred of mercy!
Gyaaaagh!

You took part in torturing my brother...and then
you stooped even lower seeking to take his life...
I'll make sure you regret all of it!
Gwaaaargh...!
...Hmph. Seems they were all bark and no bite.
And you were as strong as ever!

Of course I was. But more importantly...I can see
that you've grown a bit.
Really? I'm not sure what you're talking about.
